items.title: Civic App Tour
items.objective: Learn the core features (Dashboards, Elections, Proposals, Treasury) and how to navigate.
content: Open Dashboard to see your civic KPIs and profile progress.
Visit Elections to preview mock ballots and results.
Visit Proposals to see student proposals and voting.
Open Treasury to tweak budgets and see trade-offs.

assessments.prompt: Which feature is most useful to you and why?
